data.title: Red Rock Villas Apartments
data.meta_description: Satisfy your penchant for luxury at Red Rock Villas Apartments. Located near Summerlin and Red Rock Canyon, our Las Vegas apartments and townhomes deliver impressive accommodations and boutique-inspired living.
data.text:
Your Las Vegas Retreat

Red Rock Villas Apartments & Townhomes

Satisfy your penchant for luxury at Red Rock Villas Apartments. Located near Summerlin and Red Rock Canyon, our Las Vegas apartments and townhomes deliver impressive accommodations and boutique-inspired living. The fully equipped 24-hour fitness center ensures you wonât have to worry about maintaining a costly gym membership. And a resort-style swimming pool helps you cool off and beat the Nevada heat. With regularly scheduled resident events and a calendar for fitness and wellness activities, Red Rock Villas Apartments is more than just a home. Weâre a community.

Fun & Fitness

Community Amenities

With so many amenities to support and enhance your lifestyle, Red Rock Villas Apartments makes it easy to craft a day you love. Whether you want to lounge with your neighbors on the luxe sundeck by the pool, beat your personal best at the fitness center, or unwind in the conversation spaces in the upscale clubhouse, our community makes it easy. And because weâre conveniently located near Downtown Summerlin, youâre always within reach of entertainment.

Style & Comfort

Apartment Features

Light-filled and brimming with exceptional details, your new home at Red Rock Villas Apartments is built for comfort. With floor plans beginning at 1,462 square feet, our apartments and townhomes in Las Vegas are large, well-designed, and â most importantly â comfortable. Stainless-steel appliances elevate your chef-style kitchen, which comes complete with modern wood cabinetry and an oversized, single-basin sink. Spacious walk-in closets keep you organized, and available direct access garages ensure convenient parking.

2-Car Direct Access Garages

Stainless-Steel Appliances

Luxury Wood VinylÂ Flooring

Pet Policy

Red Rock Villas Apartments is proud to invite your cats and dogs to our pet-friendly Las Vegas apartments. Up to two pets are welcome per home with a $250 nonrefundable pet fee, a $200 refundable pet deposit, and $25 per month pet rent. Large dogs are fine, and some breed restrictions apply. For more information about our pet policy, reach out to our friendly leasing team.

We Make it Easy

Parking

This is home, and we know your on-the-go lifestyle means you want to be ready whenever adventure calls. Reach out to our friendly leasing staff to learn more about the parking options we offer for your convenience and preference, including:

2-Car Direct Access Garages
